<title>Contact – Canterbury International Hotel</title>
<meta name="description" content="Our Reservations team is here to help, either by phone or email, we’ll be happy to answer any questions you may have. The Reservations team can help you with accommodation bookings, event enquires, restaurant bookings and much more." />
